title: Installing CMS on Linux
pageDescription: Installing Joomla on Almalinux in VK Cloud, installing OpenCart on Ubuntu in VK Cloud, installing WordPress on AlmaLinux in VK Cloud, installing 1C-Bitrix on Ubuntu in VK Cloud.
shortDescription: How to install and configure various CMS on a family of Linux operating systems
metaDescription: Usage scenarios: how to install Joomla, OpenCart, WordPress, 1C-Bitrix based on VK Cloud resources
